messages.title: 4 Positive Reasons to Vote for Patrick Mercer
messages.content: Education is crucial for our economic recovery. Our population is expanding, and so must our NHS. We need more Police Officers and less anti-social behaviour. Patrick will fight for those who fight for us.

messages.title: Only by Voting for Patrick Mercer Can We Achieve the Change We Need.
messages.content: The Labour Government is spending more on debt interest repayments than on tackling poverty. We will cut the deficit quicker, so we can spend on the things that matter. We will help you keep mortgage rates lower. The gap between exam results of children from rich and poor backgrounds has widened. We will create new schools to raise standards for all, with extra money to children from the poorest families.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Education is crucial for our economic recovery. Will fight to improve our schools.
Our population is expanding, and so must our NHS. Will fight for better healthcare.
We need more Police Officers and less anti-social behaviour. Will fight for safer communities.
Will fight for those who fight for us. Our heroes and their families must have our support.

issues.economy: The Labour Government is spending more on debt interest repayments than on tackling poverty. We will cut the deficit quicker, so we can spend on the things that matter.
issues.education: Education is crucial for our economic recovery. Will fight to improve our schools.
issues.health: Our population is expanding, and so must our NHS. Will fight for better healthcare.
issues.socialWelfare: Today, 1 in 5 pensioners are living in poverty. We will increase the State Pension every year and protect Disability Living Allowance and Attendance Allowance.

housing.content: We will help you keep mortgage rates lower.
